DOC.brief_summary: This longitudinal , randomize , control interventional multi centric study effect low leg strengthen exercise quadriceps force walk people knee osteoarthritis . At study centre twenty subject include , total 40 participant . Subjects randomize equally ( 1:1 ) 1 active arm 1 control arm . The objective study evaluate effect twelve week quadriceps strengthen mechanical output quadriceps locomotion . A secondary purpose explore relationship quadriceps strengthen compressive knee loading . The hypothesis quadriceps strength training change quadriceps force , power , work locomotion people knee osteoarthritis . Primary outcome quadriceps force walking , secondary output quadriceps power work knee compressive load walk . Explorative measure isometric concentric isokinetic leg muscle strength , radiographic score knee ( Kellgren Lawrence ) , one-leg rise chair test ( maximum number rep ) lateral step-up test ( maximum number rep ) .
DOC.brief_title: Strengthening Exercise Quadriceps Force During Walking
DOC.criteria: A medical doctor perform screen potential participant . Subjects must meet follow inclusion criterion eligible study entry : Knee OA diagnose accord American College Rheumatology criterion ( 26 ) , clinical symptom radiographically verified tibiofemoral osteoarthritis one knee . Aged 40 65 yr . Untrained ( i.e . le 2 hour exercise per week ) Subject must use assistive walking device Willing able complete study visit procedure Willing hold activity exercise level generally consistent study except encompass study . In general good health , opinion investigator , base medical history physical examination , necessary , laboratory value . Laboratory test prescribe medical doctor screen visit .
